hero.name: Délanno KOTCHO
hero.title: Senior Fullstack Developer
hero.description: Passionate about creating modern and performant web applications, I transform your ideas into innovative digital solutions with 5 years of experience in React, Node.js development and cloud technologies.

about.title: About Me
about.subtitle: Discover my journey, my development philosophy and the values that guide my work
about.journeyDescription1: Graduated from an engineering school in computer science, I started my career as a frontend developer before evolving towards fullstack development. My 5 years of experience have allowed me to master the entire modern web development chain.
about.journeyDescription2: Passionate about new technologies, I continuously train myself on the latest innovations in the sector. I have had the opportunity to work on various projects, from startups to large companies, which has given me a complete vision of web development challenges.
about.philosophyDescription: I firmly believe that technology must serve humanity. Every line of code I write aims to improve the user experience while respecting development best practices. Technical innovation only makes sense if it brings real added value.

cleanCode.title: Clean Code
cleanCode.description: I write maintainable, tested and documented code to ensure project sustainability.

collaboration.title: Collaboration
collaboration.description: I prioritize teamwork and transparent communication with all stakeholders.

performance.title: Performance
performance.description: I optimize every application to offer a smooth and fast user experience.

security.title: Security
security.description: Security is at the heart of my developments, from authentication to deployment.
